goalData.title: Learn Guitar
goalData.description: Master basic guitar chords and play my favorite songs
goalData.aiAnalysis:
To master guitar, I've broken this into daily micro-habits:

1. **Finger Warm-up** (5 minutes)
   - Practice basic finger stretches
   - Chromatic exercises for dexterity
   - Build muscle memory

2. **Chord Practice** (15 minutes)
   - Focus on 2-3 chords per week
   - Practice smooth transitions
   - Use a metronome for timing

3. **Song Application** (10 minutes)
   - Apply learned chords to simple songs
   - Practice strumming patterns
   - Record progress weekly

4. **Theory Learning** (5 minutes)
   - Learn one music theory concept
   - Understanding chord progressions
   - Build foundation knowledge

These habits focus on consistency over intensity, building skill gradually.

goalData.title: Start a Side Business
goalData.description: Launch an online business selling handmade crafts
goalData.aiAnalysis:
Building a side business requires systematic daily actions:

1. **Product Development** (20 minutes)
   - Create one new craft item daily
   - Document creation process
   - Build inventory consistently

2. **Market Research** (10 minutes)
   - Study competitor pricing
   - Identify target customer needs
   - Monitor market trends

3. **Brand Building** (15 minutes)
   - Create social media content
   - Engage with potential customers
   - Build online presence

4. **Business Planning** (10 minutes)
   - Track expenses and revenue
   - Plan next day's priorities
   - Review and adjust strategy

Small daily actions compound into significant business growth.

goalData.title: Run a Marathon
goalData.description: Complete a full 26.2-mile marathon in under 4 hours
goalData.aiAnalysis:
Marathon training requires progressive daily habits:

1. **Morning Run** (30-45 minutes)
   - Follow structured training plan
   - Build endurance gradually
   - Track pace and distance

2. **Strength Training** (20 minutes)
   - Core strengthening exercises
   - Leg and glute workouts
   - Injury prevention focus

3. **Nutrition Tracking** (5 minutes)
   - Log daily food intake
   - Monitor hydration levels
   - Plan race-day nutrition

4. **Recovery Routine** (10 minutes)
   - Stretching and foam rolling
   - Sleep quality monitoring
   - Rest day activities

Consistent training with proper recovery leads to marathon success.

goalData.title: Master Spanish
goalData.aiAnalysis:
Language mastery through daily immersion habits:

1. **Vocabulary Building** (15 minutes)
   - Learn 10 new words daily
   - Use spaced repetition system
   - Practice word associations

2. **Speaking Practice** (10 minutes)
   - Record daily voice notes
   - Practice pronunciation
   - Simulate conversations

3. **Listening Comprehension** (20 minutes)
   - Watch Spanish content
   - Listen to podcasts/music
   - Improve ear training

4. **Grammar Study** (10 minutes)
   - Learn one grammar rule
   - Practice with exercises
   - Apply in context

Daily exposure and practice create natural language acquisition.
